subject: Clean spec file for Yocto compatibility
commitMessage:
Clean spec file for Yocto compatibility

* Set valid group tags.
* Use macros.

Also remove generated files "Makefile" and "configure".

Change-Id: Iabd910c859ba39ab4c7d1940df30dbe42ed9c87f
Signed-off-by: Kévin THIERRY <kevin.thierry@open.eurogiciel.org>

comments.message: Uploaded patch set 1.
Patch Set 1: Verified+1
Uploaded patch set 2.
Patch Set 2: Verified+1
Patch Set 2: Code-Review+1
Uploaded patch set 3.
Patch Set 3: Verified+1 Code-Review+1

Patch Set 3: Code-Review+2

Clean up Spec file to imporve Yocto compatibility
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.

Patch Set 2:

The tag submit/tizen_common/20140929.110645 was pushed, but it was not completed because of the following reason(s):

- The commit 20e474eda39bdaa3ab7a80345e77d93967d55f88 tag attached does NOT exist in git tree or gerrit open change. Please make sure the commit has been pushed to gerrit and correct magical ref refs/for/branch, then re-submit tag.

- Comments: SR 29218 is set to accepted

Patch Set 2:

The SR (Submit Request) has been accepted to OBS Tizen:IVI project.
- Package: xmlsec1
- Reviewer: tizenrobot
- Comments: SR 29369 is set to accepted state. Your submission has been accepted into Tizen IVI project.
-
After rebuild your package(s) will end up in the latest IVI snapshot repositories:
i586 atom repository: https://download.tizen.org/snapshots/tizen/ivi/ivi/latest/repos/ivi/
i586 emulator repository: https://download.tizen.org/snapshots/tizen/ivi/ivi/latest/repos/emul/
-
You can find latest snapshot images in the latest IVI snapshot repository:
i586 EFI image: https://download.tizen.org/snapshots/tizen/ivi/ivi/latest/images/ivi-efi-i586/
i586 MBR image: https://download.tizen.org/snapshots/tizen/ivi/ivi/latest/images/ivi-mbr-i586/
i586 MBR emulator image: https://download.tizen.org/snapshots/tizen/ivi/ivi/latest/images/ivi-mbr-i586-emul/
-
Your package(s) will be included into the next daily release.
- Git project: platform/upstream/adns
- Tag:submit/tizen_ivi/20141007.444444
- Request URL:https://build.tizen.org/request/show/29369
